Hm, I don't know about your data, but...

Maybe you could have an object for each of the things that make up your 
record? For each DB query result (or record), each data from a file, 
each other information gathered? Then have another object that ties 
these smaller objects together and use a Visitor pattern to extract the 
XML?

Anyway, in Java you would not copy the data if you pass it around, 
since the references are actually passed, or did I miss some point here?

What about writing while reading? Can you start reading and once you 
got enough data you write it as XML?

Hope this helps,

Robert
